Type: Leggings
Price: 25.00

Up your workout game and get a pair of our Banded Seamless Leggings. With a slim fit, these leggings boast a flattering design thanks to their 4-way stretch construction. The material is stretchy and soft, super comfy. Makes your booty look great!  These are perfect for all activities.

    Details:

    • The model is 5'4" and wears a size medium and has a 28" waist.
    • Squat proof
    • 4-way breathable stretch fabric
    • Sweat-wicking properties
    • Elastic waistline
    • 79% nylon, 15% polyester, 6% spandex

    Size Guide:

    • High compression

entry.title: Fitness Tracker & Meal Planner: For Exercise Workout Log and Food Journal
entry.summary:
Vendor: KOR Fitness
Type: Fitness Planner
Price: 19.00

Product details

Stay on track with your food and fitness goals! Measuring 10.25" (h) x 7.25" (w), you can take this planner anywhere, even to the gym!

Be more accountable-track those workouts and meals to maintain or work towards a better you!

This simple yet effective tool is here to help you tackle your eating and exercise goals, and stay motivated with weekly inspirational words, goal-setting, and rewards. Treat yourself!

 

Product Dimensions (L x W x H) 10.25 x 7.50 x 0.50 Inches
